USDS Mailing Lists

The old GSA Listservs will be migrated to the new USDS mailing lists. If you are currently on an existing Listesrv,
you will be automatically added to the new mailing list.

For DSVA-wide issues, we have the va@lists.usds.gov mailing list. Enrollment in the va@lists.usds.gov mailing list is automatic and based on the Salesforce data maintained by the USDS HQ. For automatic enrollment, your profile should include

  1. A valid .gov email
  2. Have the VA listed as your employer, or be assigned to the VA (c.f., priorities.md).

You can check your profile at: USDS Tools Profile. If you do not have a valid VA email, are a contractor, or HQ employee that is not assigned to a VA projects, you will need to be added manually.

Joining a Mailing List

To join a mailing list, create a ticket in the vets.gov-team repo. Assign (mphprogrammer) to the ticket, and tag it with the mailing-lists label. In the ticket include:

  1. The mailing list(s) you wish to join.
  2. Your name, and if you do not have a .gov email in your USDS profile, a preferred e-mail.

Leaving a Mailing List

To leave a mailing list, create a ticket in the vets.gov-team repo. Assign (mphprogrammer) to the ticket, and tag it with the mailing-lists label. In the ticket include:

  1. The mailing list(s) you wish to leave.
  2. The same name you had used when joining the mailing list.
